Sconter.

The game works. If it's still crashing on the character select screen, then the fault lies with you.

I'll spell it out clearly :

1) Download Mass Fix.zip : 4shared(.)com/file/207717850/f1623254

2) Place the files from Mass Fix.zip in Mass Effect 2's base directory. If you don't know what this is, it's the directory with ME2's .exe file.

3) Run RunFIX.bat. If RunFIX.bat, Arc.exe and Fix.arc (all from Mass Fix.zip) aren't in the same directory as MassEffect2Launcher.exe, then you're doing it wrong.

4) Download this : 4shared(.)com/file/208773253/9396f426

5) Extract the files to ME2's CookedPC directory (\Mass Effect 2\BioGame\CookedPC). Overwrite the files when prompted.

That's it. The game will NOT crash on the male/female selection prompt if you follow those directions to the letter.

How to install DLC::

The game folder contains 2 files:
regsetup and reg

Jus use them to make registry enteries!!!

Easy As IT Can BE!!!

Open the notepad file and in it find the line which mentions "Path", there fill the path of the folder where game is.

Save the notepad file AS: MassEffect2.reg
Copy Exactly

Njoy!!

I found out you need another registry:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\BioWare]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\BioWare\Mass Effect 2]
"Language"="en"
"Readme"="Readme_en"
"ProductName"="Mass Effect 2"
"Path"="Path\\Games\\Mass Effect 2"
"Flavour"="DVD"
"GUID"="{75D84EF7-0D8C-4e70-B3FA-7B42A5D4E0EB}"
"GameExplorer"="{F82FFEDC-F3AB-4507-B642-D4C95ACE8EF3}"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\{75D84EF7-0D8C-4e70-B3FA-7B42A5D4E0EB}]
"Publisher"="Electronic Arts, Inc."
"DisplayName"="Mass Effect 2"
"DisplayVersion"="1.00"
"NoRepair"=dword:00000001
"NoModify"=dword:00000001
"HelpLink"="Path\\Games\Mass Effect 2\\docs\\EA Help\\Electronic_Arts_Technical_Support.htm"
"Readme"="Path\\docs\\Readme_en.txt"

Just replace path, with ur installation dir

Ok this game is so awesome, even noobs should play this. So here goes:

Noob special instructions:

Step1: Download and install the latest winrar software (use google whenever you need help)

Step2: Extract the contents of PC_Mass.Effect.2.Multi-6.Rip.-TPTB to a drive with at-least 12 gb free space (maybe 

higher)

Step3: Go to the extracted folder and run "Setup.bat" (Vista,W7... use admin login)

Step4: At 99% wait and install all the support tools (like directx, games for windows live, etc)

Step5: Extract the 3 files of PC_Mass.Effect.2.FINAL-FIXRip.-TPTB (uploaded by Shroo) to the folder where you ran 

setup.bat (the three files should be in here and not inside a sub folder)

Step6: Run "RunFIX.bat"

Step7: Go to Start > Run and type regedit (Vista and W7, just type regedit in the search bar in start menu)

Step8: Click File > Import 

Step9: Go to the folder where you ran setup.bat and choose the regsetup.txt and click ok/yes (if the txt file is not displayed choose "All Files" where it now says (*.reg)



That's it. Enjoy :)
